body:
Extra (this is canon too):

Six months have passed since then, and I have been busy every day as a college student. She was able to work part-time in class, and for the first time she was able to. That day, it was the encounter that comforted me who shed tears in the bus. (As expected, I could not honestly tell why I was crying). I can say that my college life is fulfilling. At that time, MC received an email from MC-Friend:
"Mother was pregnant. She is 6 months pregnant now. Would you please come home for once?"
credits to @HEAT MAN who send a link to a site that explains the plot (you can also find the pixiv account of the author).

(read my previous comment at the bottom to know the plot of the story).
Mother resist at first but when they finally meet eye for an eye, she understood everything and let her son do what he gotta do. MC blur out his true feelings and everything else to her. After it ends, Mother say the classic "I'm sorry I didn't notice" with tears. MC apologize, he just destroyed everything. Later they parted without saying any words, they both holding their tears. The moment MC walk away from the house he can hear her Mother cries but he didn't turn his back on. Finally at the bus after he's far away, the feeling of loneliness and loss got to him and he cried over the picture of MC and his Mother. "While thinking of happiness with my former mother, I will never return." - The End.

Mother of course felt sad and lonely when she hears that but she support his decisions. MC think that he can burried his hidden feelings for his mom to the graveyard. At Page66, lots of inner-feeling stuff here before the climax. MC and Mother spend the night alone reminiscing their good 'ol time together before the depature (idk where MC-Friend is, maybe late at work). Those moment make MC cry and Mother said "MC if you're lonely, you don't have to force yourself to go. If you're gone, I'll be lonely too." hearing that made MC snap, he can't hold his feelings any longer and he push her down. Sad Sex (Rape) coming through.

MC-Friend parent support their son's decisions and it seems like he buy the ring with his own money too. At Page52, After MC-Friend became an adult (18yo) they decided to married for real and they did. Of course they live together from now on and of course MC gonna get the cucked dilemma of hearing them fuckings every night and all that jazz. The good 'ol live of MC living alone with her caring Mother are gone. She's not "The Mother of MC" anymore, she's "The Wive of MC-Friend" now. At Page61, Mother being a single mom has face so much hardship, as a son, MC really wish happiness for his mom, that moment finally came now but it's not the kind of happiness that the MC expect. There's so much dilemma MC faced here but seeing the child of his Mother and MC-Friend and her new happiness really broke him into pieces. MC see that her mom can be happy without him and with this tormenting feeling he had, he decided to live alone (he use going to college as an excuse).

I'll just paste the summary of the story it's canon: There's an essay for each of the "Parts" of this work.
With google translate, the plot basically goes:

MC lives with his single Mother, his Dad died, MC loves his Mother and keep her feeling as much as normal as possible. His mom ends up dating his friend and we see things from MC perspective.

Mom and MC-Friend do couples things which MC only having gut feelings of what they are doing but later on it became obvious how much of real couple they are. MC became a good 'ol cucked in this kind of stories, he doesn't like that shit but what can you do, they just couple doing couple things and both MC-Friend and Mother doesn't being a villain towards him. This shit slowly tormenting him.

At Page50, it seems like MC-Friend is serious with his relationship with Mother, he finally propose to her with ring and of course Mother hella happy with that so they fucked like rabbits afterward. Mother ends up pregnant after 17 years.
What do I feel? Should I feel happy for the mother? Lol shit is killing me

what a  fucking shit, fucking fucking shit 

anyway
EDIT: No, forget it. It's the same sh*t as Naomi-san. Just, with the difference that son's revenge is on his Sl*tty mom.
@ulqiorra_no4      Why did you have to remind me? I was already forgetting ... But, now that you mention it, it is so. This would have been a less sour ending.
Its like Naomi San but here son take revenge on mother instead of his friend
Thanks man
Actually good high quality art isn't always needed
That ending was unecessary
My favorite  finally she got pregnant by her son rape

I was curious about the story too but I went on another website and found the answer from another user. I’ll copy and paste the link here below. Tldr it’s about a boy who lives with his mom.  And the downfall as she starts dating his friend. Those last panels you see is the son raping the mother then leaving. She ends up pregnant but the son goes on.
